creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Mr and Mrs James McClatchy
description: cluster of slender bamboo stalks at L growing upward toward UR, one branch is bending towards LR; drooping bamboo foliage near ends of stalks; stalks and leaves outlined with white against grey background to give illusion of snow
marks: Signature and Seals center L edge
title: Bamboo in Snow
